jpg-to-pdf.question: Which image formats are supported?
jpg-to-pdf.answer: JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WEBP are supported. You can mix formats in one PDF.

jpg-to-pdf.question: Will the conversion reduce image quality?
jpg-to-pdf.answer: Images are embedded without extra compression to preserve original quality.

png-to-pdf.question: Can I upload non-PNG formats?
png-to-pdf.answer: Yes. PNG, JPG/JPEG, and WEBP are supported and converted into a single PDF.

png-to-pdf.question: How are pages sized and arranged?
png-to-pdf.answer: Images are auto-fitted to A4 pages with centered layout for best readability.
